content.detailedDescription: I dont remember the date, i just know that it was the late 80s.  it was fairlylate at night, and i had just turned onto the highway after leaving a circle kconvenience store in the middle of town.  there was a car ahead of me.  all of asudden, a large bluish-silvery sphere shot down out of the sky and hovered inthe air over the highway for just a few seconds before shooting off to the west,making an l with its flight.  i slammed on the brakes and the car ahead of medid also, but neither of us stopped to get out, we just drove on afterwards.  ihad never seen anything like it, and from what i understand, there arent many,if any, known flying objects that could have made such a maneuver.  i felt awedby it96 it had such a  beautiful color and it was so radiant!  id be curious to seeif anyone else reported it.
content.summary: A silvery-blue globe

content.detailedDescription: I am an airline employee and at that time, i was sent to fergus falls to helpopen a new station. on the night of 10/12/94, after all flights were gone, thestation manager, the fbo owner and i were walking beside the hanger/officearea/terminal. as we walked and talked, i noticed something above us. i lookedup and saw a large triangular object with no lights, and no sound passing slowlyoverhead. i asked the others if they saw it, and they said yes. the fbo ownersaid we get those all the time. it took about 1 1/2 - 2 minutes to pass by anddisappear in the night sky. it did not turn, ascend or descend. straight andlevel but very slow flight. vehicle was at about 800 - 1000 ft.
content.summary: Silent ufo directly overhead
Saw  orange glowing sphere with two orange lights

content.detailedDescription: Witness 2s narrative:back of ___s home faces south.  he was in the hot tub between 9:45 and 9:55p.M. it was twilight and only the brightest stars were out.  it took between twoand a minute and a half to cover the sky which ____ could see.  it went west toeast, toward detroit.It was a bunch of lights, which would flicker and go out, then others wouldlight up, like a cloud pulsating with heat.  reminded him of fireworks, and itwas moving horizontally across the sky, not on a descent.  about the speed asmall prop driven airplane would travel, or a little slower.  parts would flameout, fluctuating and dying out and other parts would light up.  reminded him ofhow fireflies flicker on and off.It was a yellow or match-flame color, but he didnt notice any blue colors.  itwas about 1 thumb height above the treeline, and his two large fists clenchedand held side by side would about cover the size of the object, at arms length. it left a vapor trail which seemed to be a part of the cloud.Witness 1s narrative:driving south on u.S. 31, somewhere south of grand haven.  clear night, someground fog.  family was looking at stars.  saw bright light in southwestern sky,looked like a plane and was moving no faster than an airplane.Viewed it for at least 15 seconds, maybe longer.  it was a small light, nobigger than a planes landing lights would look at a distance.  as they watchedit, it developed a long red trail, looked like a light beaming at them throughfog or cloud.  then they viewed 7 or 8 bright lights behind the main light, andthese were glowing brightly in the vapor trail.The object suddenly disappeared.  i asked mr. ____ if they simply lost sight ofit behind trees or something, and he said "no, it just disappeared."he is a reporter for a west michigan newspaper and he said the paper receivedseveral reports of this sighting.
content.summary: Ifo - probable re-entry seen across michigan

content.detailedDescription: we were in a feild on a dirt road going home theni looked to the right and saw a light hovering in the paster and we thought itwas a helicopter but there was no sound my wife and myself paniced we couldntsee anything but light hoveringover us following our every move we were in thetruck and it died and i put it in neutruel and coasted down hill and when wereached the bottom it dissapeared
content.summary: Saw light and it followed us to river

content.detailedDescription: Leduc is a relatively small town with a population of around 15,000 situatedjust south of edmonton. the area is dominated by residential housing, schools,religious centers and surrounded by farmlands. at roughly 2:45 am i decided tostep outside for a breath of fresh air. the night was clear and windless. as igazed upon the stars a grouping of them began to move. my first thought was thati was having a dizzy spell so i gave my head a shake and refocused my gaze uponthe sky. i soon realized that i wasn92t dizzy at all when three points of light, forming a triangle made their wayfrom south to north. the triangle of lights moved at a speed similar tosatellites but unlike satellites this grouping changed directions 30 secondsinto the sighting. the triangle began to move east. the object was either verylarge or very low and appeared to blot out passing stars. the object wascompletely silent. the lights on each tip were solid white but of very lowintensity. there was a distinct impression that this object was doing its bestnot to be seen as it moved across the star field. as i realized what i wasseeing it occurred to me that i should attempt to make record of the sighting.Very quickly i entered the house and grabbed my digital video camera. i returnedto the front of the house and began filming the object as it made its waytowards the northeast. i soon lost sight of the object behind a neighbor
content.summary: Nightime residential black triangle capture on vid
Ufo seen in poquoson va

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:23 pm, my brother5b witness 25d pointed out at the northern sky a group of lights which moved in tandem. thelights were about the size of a star and moved in a group. the came from thenorth and slowly drifted towards a northwesterly direction. my first impressionwas a flight of airplanes flying in formation but the arrangement and speed wastoo slow and too synchronized for a flight of aircraft. i would like to know ifother malaysians in the petaling jaya area reported the same thing.
content.summary: Group of glowing objects moving in tandem with eac
Ufo sighting
Saw a craft separate into two, then diverge

content.detailedDescription: 1.Me, my sister and my dad had been swimming.2.I just looked at the direction ofthe object.3.I first thought it was a helicopter but after some seconds irealised it could only be a flying saucer.4.It was shaped like a saucer and wasred, it had yellow lights and was flying in different directions totallysilently.5.It flyed away.
content.summary: Me, my sister and my dad saw a red flying saucer.

content.detailedDescription: 1.  we were staying at a hotel across the streetfrom the reno airport.2.  i5b ed5d was looking out the window at the night sky.3.  at first i thought that i wasseeing a slow moving plane but it was moving too slow.4.  i was over joyed atseeing what i thought was my first ufo encounter.  i woke up stewart so he couldsee the lights.  by that time they had turned brighter and formed an almoststraight line.5.  saw 4 lights forming square and 3 light forming triangle. triangle lights were in front of square lights and they all moved in a uniformpattern going south.  lights were approaching reno airport.  lights changed fromuniform pattern to almost a straight line and they got brighter as they went outof sight. 6.  lost sight of lights when they went behind the hotel.
content.summary: Saw lights in the sky
Boomerang type over loveland co

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my deck with my telescope. i had been outside for about anhour. i was looking in the direction of the andromeda galaxy with the telescope.I decided that i would look for the  andromeda galaxy with a pair of binoculars.As i was searching, i noticed three craft flying in a triangle formation.  oneforward and two a equal distance behind. the objects looked like points oflight. i noticed them between polaris and the andromeda galaxy. i moved to thewall of my house so i could steady the binoculars. i believe it took about 3minutes for the craft to fly by.  the craft were headed in an easterly directionand flew from my prospective from left to right. i lost sight of the craft whenthey flew behind some trees.The craft flew past several stars. i was able to seethe space between the craft, so i believe i was seeing three separatecraft.There are a lot of aircraft that fly over here, but these craft did notresemble airplanes. one reason was the craft were much higher in the sky andsecond they had no shape. they didn92t have any flashing lights. i thought i was seeing 3 satellites flying information. i checked the nasa satellite tracking site and didn92t find anything that matched what i saw.
content.summary: Three craft in triangle formation
Bright daylight object traveling in obital path. h

content.detailedDescription: on saturday august 24th witness was spending the weekend with herboyfriend at his home at the villages in oxford area.They were both asleep when she was suddenly startled and woke up. shelooked over at the clock and it was 01:30 am. she was feeling very anxious. as she glanced over towards the doorway she saw asilhouette. it was of a "being" that she has seen before. the beingstands approximately four feet tall, has a large head for its heightand long arms that hang down approximately two feet. she wanted to wakeup her boyfriend john, but couldnt get herself to move. she feltparalyzed. the being was continued to look at her. she "felt" asthough being wanted her to come towards it. this event seemed to lastten minutes. although she can not be sure how long it lasted. sheclosed her eyes for what she thought was a short time and when shereopened them it was gone. everything seemed normal and she eventuallywent back to sleep.
content.summary: Entity - bedroom sighting
6 or 7 bright white, rice-shaped objects moving in

content.detailedDescription: while driving north, noticed an ellipical objecttraveling east. it appeared to be lit with a bright light from within with anexterior light traveling around it, like the planet saturn. it appeared totraveling very fast and then suddenly stopped without slowing down. while it washovering, i tried to manuever the car closer to get a better look, but afterbeing blocked by buildings could not find it again.
content.summary: An illuminated extremely bright object in ozone park

content.detailedDescription: 78 degrees f, crystal clear cloud free sky, unlimited cieling, while lying on ahammock staring up to the sky just above and to the right i observed a whitelight darting in an area that would be equivelent to a softball held at armslength.  i watched it closely for about 45 seconds and saw no other air trafficfor several minutes prior.  the glowing object darted to a stationary point justsouth west of where it displayed these movemnets.  it seemed to start glowingand dissappeared.  i have been a police officer for 23 years and have seen manyexplainable things in the nites sky.  this was not one of them.  the onlydescrition i can equate is when the watch crystal catches a beam of sun anddances around the walls / cielings.  sorry for the low tech description for apossible high tech event. would love to know if radar tracked thisevent.Respectfully,david h. korey-new jersey
content.summary: Fast moving white light / monmouth county n.J.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside and to myleft notice abright light futtering around.It thenstreaked down at a high rate of speed,then stop on a dime and begin flutteringaround,shortly it disappeared below the hill. it appeared to be many milesaway.I called carol to come out to see it when she spotted a second one due westof us.We watched it for ahour or so until it too fell below the trees. both ofthese objects moved very quickly both up and down as well as from side toside.When we frist saw the object, we thought it was a helicoptor,but i was atone time a pilot and it flew way too fast and no noise.
content.summary: Observed flashing red and green and white lights.

content.detailedDescription: i observed one black triangle with the pulsing redlight behind and the white light on both sides of the red one.  this trianglewas silent, travelling from southeast to northwest almost over my home, over 500feet above.  i saw 7 black triangles at different intervals travelling west inthe northern sky.  i observed 1 black triangle travelling east in the northernsky, and one black triangle travelling south in the western sky.  all thesecrafts had the same dark angled body with the same configuration of lightsbehind.  i also observed the diamond object which i have reported previously.
content.summary: 9 black triangles with red and white lights in rea
After taking sky photos, noticed unusual objects i

content.detailedDescription: We were about 6 miles south of gillette going home.  i noticed what i at firstthought was a falling star.  i told my husband and he said it was not fallingbut was in horizontal flight.  it was neon green and was traveling at a highrate of speed, and had a streak(trail) of light behind it.  my husband said ithad to be moving at appx. 700-800 mph.  he also said it was at lest 2,500 feetup, but appeared to be the size of a football.  it went behind the clouds for abrief second and you could still see the neon green glow even behind the cloud. it then appeared in the clear sky once again, and then it was gone in a second. it never appeared to be at an arch like a falling star, and it was definitely ona straight path to the e-se direction.
content.summary: Neon green object  with streak flying very fast
Green fireball, horizontal, sparking, nw to ne 45d

content.detailedDescription: i was observing the morning sky during the predawnhours.  i usually stand out and watch for falling stars.  directly overhead isaw a moving light.  as my eyes foucussed i could see that the light closelyresembled the right edge of a capital d (letter).  the light was faintly whiteand blurred like neon.  the object appeared to be at a great distance and wasabout the size of my index finger.  the object moved rapidly from directlyoverhead to the western horizon.  perhaps a second of time lapsed or at best asecond and a half.  the sky was very dark so visibilty was very good. there wasno audible sound related to the object in fact it seemed unusually quiet to me. perhaps the silence was due to my own curious feeling mixed with a little awe.
content.summary: Sigheted a dimly lit object shaped somewhat like a

content.detailedDescription: My 11 yr. old son26 i were returning home from my mothers house in dawsonville, ga at approx7:40p.M. i was driving my truck down shoal creek rd. i remember vividly tellingmy son that we needed to get home as this was a sunday night26 he had to get a bath when we got home26 get ready for school the next day. suddenly, we rounded a curve,26 to our amazement, there was this black triangle shaped craft right in frontof us about 50 yards at tree top level. it was really weird, the way it moved orfloated, almost like a puppett on a string or a floating leaf. the craftappeared to be positioned upright on its side. it was very black with dark blueflourescent lights at each corner. we could also see what looked like a marking.5b                                               ll5d on the bottom right in the center of this thing. my son26 i could not beleive what we were seeing. i swerved off the road26 came to slight stop. we were both stunned, unable to talk. we just kind oflooked at each other26 then back to this craft. all of sudden, it was as if someone just flipped aswitch26 this thing disappeared right in front of our eyes. there was another car thatcame past26 it was if they did not see anything! afterwards, on the way home, we wereboth dead silent the rest of the way home. as i pulled into our carport, istopped the truck, turned it off26 just staired ahead for 5 - 10 minutes. i was then able to simply ask my sonif he saw what i did? he was adamant about seeing this too. without furtherconversation i told him to go immediately inside26 draw what he saw26 i did the same. then we swapped pictures26 compared. it was exactly the same, we had not talked about it the whole wayhome. please respond to this in some way as i have had other experiences beforemy son was born. at least 2 different times. once as a child, another as anadult. me26 my wife saw some type of enteties one night at about 3:00a.M. please contactme asap!!!Home telephone is 770-664-1430cell phone is 404-862-9872email is :tjakesx4@aol.Comemail #2 is : jakeskeno3852@aol.Com respectfully submitted,tomjakes
content.summary: Had a very close encounter with a black triagular

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were taking a walk and it was really dark outside.  it was around10pm.  i was looking at the stars and then something caught my eye.  at first ithought it looked like comet hale-bopp from a few years ago, cos it seemedreally bright, but then it started moving fast and eratically.  i wasquestioning my judgement/depth perception cos i thought it could have been afirefly (it was bright and moved like a fly), but my wife was saying it was toohigh to be a fly, and after some observation it seemed as high as a normalplane. then it was flying like a frisbee on a 45-degree tilt, or like aboomerang.  i was not sure of the shape though.  it was going way too fast to bea plane.  after a while of following it in the sky, it flew towards the west anddisappeared from our view.  (i hope this description is not too vague!)  btwthere were a couple of reports of ufos over ottawa last week on our morningradio talk show - one was triangular shaped, the other was a big bright light.
content.summary: Strange fast-moving object over ottawa, ontario, c
Saw small roundish object in daytime just above gr
